Name: Elly
About the game: You wake up on a planet not your own. You can turn into a gun? Yes! Things are about to get weird. A metroidvania style 2D adventure platformer. Speak to the locals, level up your power and seek to find the truth. Movement is key to exploring and revealing the secrets tangled into the heart of Elly. Key Features : Everything Is Hand Drawn Dialogue System - Choices Matter! Unique Large Zones To Explore Player Upgrades Challenging Platforming Dynamic/Fast Paced Movement System - Dodge Spam, Wall Slides/Jumps, Glider To Rule The Air Deep And Strange Story Lore To Uncover Full Controller Support Full Key Mapping System Unique and Original Music
Meta Title: Elly: Feb 5, 2021, Remy WIlliams and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Elly? Check out the release date (Feb 5, 2021), developer insights from Remy WIlliams, and a complete game summary.
